title: New: Indivisible from Process Type Foundry
content:
Is a complete reduction of form a viable and conceptually accurate approach to type design? Indivisible is a free 10 pitch monospaced typeface with a complete character set.   
   
Available now:   
 [http://www.processtypefoundry.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020090505/http:/www.processtypefoundry.com/)
author: eolson

comments.content:
Hi Eric, I just tried to load it down (Mac OS), but i got a page full of weird text....(in my browser)   
   
Is my browser trying make my ife difficult, or is your link maybe not OK?   
   
(Browser

Control + click, then "Download Link to Disk"   
   
It worked for me, it can work for you!   
   
(IE5, Mac OS)
